thread.section_title: BenQ Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BenQ Direct | benqdirect.com
thread.title: Michael Lee
thread.title_full: BenQ Direct reviewed by Michael Lee

author: Michael Lee
title: Michael Lee
text: The order was handled perfectly, the monitor was shipped with great packaging and best of all it worked as expected with my laptop via an HDMI connection at the stated resolution. The clarity of the monitor is exceptional. The only thing negative I have noticed in the small time that I have been able to test is that there seems to be some minute flashing when viewing video on the screen but I will need more time to examine this further once I get my battery issue resolved on my PC. So far I feel like this was a great purchase.
